withdrawalAddress.description: The withdrawal address for the given validator

to.description: The address this transaction it to.

gasLimit.description: The maximum amount of gas that this block was permitted to use

value.description: The amount (in wei) this transaction is sending

chainId.description: The chain ID this transaction is authorized on, as specified by EIP-155

type.description: The EIP-2718 type of this transaction envelope

maxFeePerGas.description: The maximum price (in wei) per unit of gas this transaction will pay for the combined EIP-1559 block's base fee and this transaction's priority fee

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: The price (in wei) per unit of gas this transaction will allow in addition to the EIP-1559 block's base fee to bribe miners into giving this transaction priority

message.default: Unauthorized to request withdrawal transaction for validator public key
Error creating withdrawal transaction because one or more validators are not in active state

id.description: UUID that was specified in the node set-up request.

status.description: Current status of the nodes request

withdrawalAddress.description: The withdrawal address for the given validator

feeRecipientAddress.description: The fee recipient address for the given validator

location.description: Node location. Currently, only any is supported.

id.description: Arbitrary UUID. You can later use that UUID to check the status of the set-up operation.

validatorsCount.description: Number of validators. One validator is equal to 32 ETH.

unsignedTransaction.description: Unsigned transaction in hex format. Sign the transaction and submit it to the blockchain to perform the called action.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of the transaction in the ISO 8601 format.

signedTransaction.description: Signed transaction in hex format for broadcast to the network. Learn more about [signing transactions in Polkadot]().

stashAccountAddress.description: Proxied account is an address that transfers rights to a proxy account. The original account retains all of its rights, and the proxy account can be removed at any time.

proxyAccountAddress.description: Proxy account is an address that receives proxied account rights.

unsignedTransaction.description: Unsigned transaction in hex format. Sign the transaction and submit it to the blockchain to perform the called action.

stashAccountAddress.description: Main stash account address which keeps tokens for bonding.

rewardDestinationType.description:
Rewards destination type:

  • `staked` — Pay into the stash account, increasing the amount at stake accordingly.
  • `stash` — Pay into the stash account, not increasing the amount at stake.
  • `controller` — Pay into the controller account.
  • `account` — Pay into a custom account.
